Replace.Text: The sacred and great Augustus, you defeated many opponents with your own iron fist and became the unquestionable ruler of the country. The Rome you took over was a brick city, and you made it into a marble city. If the heroic legion commands the barbarians outside the country, the entire empire can create a bright future.

If Persia implements democracy, the masses with little experience may be influenced by a charming but short-sighted leader. In the oligarchy system, an oligarch will inevitably defeat other oligarchs, so the best way is to rule alone, and you, Darius I, is the best candidate to lead Persia into the golden age.

After the municipal square building was first built, a Roman legion appeared in the capital. When in a dictatorship or higher polity, the inheritance effect of all first-level polity systems is inherited, and when in other first-level polity systems, municipal square buildings cannot be built.
+25% [ICON_Production] productivity when building municipal square buildings in the city, municipal square buildings provide an additional [ICON_GOVERNOR] Governor title and 1 [ICON_Envoy] messenger.

Emperor Pakar, you come with the prophecy of the stars. You are Ichamna's right hand, the Sun Shield! Your astronomers explore the starry sky and observe the trajectory of Venus. Your army is brave and fearless, making the enemy frightened. Be prepared, Pakar, now is the time for you to fulfill your prophecy of the stars.

Trigger [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka time +1 epoch. With the special unit "Feedle Snake Guard". If you unlock the "Political Philosophy" municipal government, the current city and new city you have established will receive 1 Feedle Snake Guard.
Maya features ancient melee units, replace warriors, with 1 point of labor, can improve farms and plantations. +13 [ICON_Strength] combat power when located or adjacent observatory.
+13 [ICON_Strength] combat power when located or adjacent observatory.

Swedish Emperor Gustav, your military thought opened a new era of modern warfare and played an important role in the development of European military theory. You care about education, cultivate new types of military talents, and develop Swedish national culture. Let the enemy tremble in front of the Swedish army under the command of the General! The prestigious general of the northern lion shocked the whole world.

Military units within the scope of the [ICON_GreatGeneral] General +1 [ICON_Strength] Combat Power, other civilizations recruit [ICON_GreatGeneral] General You trigger 1 [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka. After the academy is built, the general's points will be +1 [ICON_GreatGeneral] per turn, and the special project "Military Research" can be carried out in cities with the academy.
Gustav’s special project, providing [ICON_Science] technology value per round, and providing [ICON_GreatGeneral] general points after completion.
The Hittite classical era featured units, replacing the swordsman. Low cost and maintenance costs.

Hittite characteristic buildings replace the library. The building will be automatically obtained after the academy is completed. Provide +1 influence, and the [ICON_Science] technology value can be provided only after unlocking the "History" municipal government.
Error 500 (Server Error)!!1500.That’s an error.There was an error. Please try again later.That’s all we know.

Supiluriuma, king of the Hittites. Your land is fertile and fertile under the blessing of the sun, and your army is invincible under the guidance of the storm. Those who betray the covenant will die under a sharp scimitar, and friends and enemies will swear to serve you as you swear to serve them.

Ignoring technological requirements, showing [ICON_Resource_Iron] iron resources, after improving [ICON_Resource_Iron] iron resources, +1 [ICON_Production] productivity when building the area in the city.
After unlocking the "Political Philosophy" municipality, each messenger sent to the city-state provides a +1 [ICON_Culture] cultural value.
Iroquois characteristic building replaces sewers. Unlock earlier and inexpensive, with an additional +2 [ICON_Production] productivity and +2 [ICON_Gold] coins.
The characteristic unit of the Iroquois classical era, replacing the swordsman. It is slightly weaker in combat power but does not consume [ICON_Resource_Iron] iron resources.
Ignore the [ICON_Movement] mobility debuffs brought by the woods and rainforests.
All units ignore the [ICON_Movement] movement debuffs brought by the woods and rainforests, and the area can be built on the woods.

Listen, this is the call of the tribe! The noble Haiwarsaw, the leader of the Iroquoi League, the tribesmen long for you to lead them through war and peace. The "Peace Law" that embodies the wisdom of our ancestors and the brave and warriors will surely protect Iroquoi for a long time in an unbreakable alliance, and everyone is waiting for your response.

Municipal Square is +1 [ICON_Food] Food, +1 [ICON_Production] Productivity, +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold Coins for the trade route to the city. After forming an alliance with any civilization, +1 alliance point per turn.
